articles.description: Follow BBC Radio 5 Sports Extra commentary and text updates from final practice for the Emilia-Romagna Grand Prix in Imola.
articles.title: F1 practice LIVE: Emilia Romagna Grand Prix 2025 times, results, radio & updates from Imola

articles.description: A furious Shane Lowry lashed out at the course and Tyrrell Hatton swore at his own club as tempers frayed at the US PGA Championship.
articles.title: US PGA Championship 2025: Tyrrell Hatton & Shane Lowry swear in outbursts at Quail Hollow

articles.description: Crystal Palace manager Oliver Glasner could make history with a first trophy - and he is already breaking Premier League records at the club.
articles.title: Oliver Glasner: Crystal Palace manager targets first major trophy for club

articles.description: The New York Knicks beat defending NBA champions Boston Celtics to reach a first Eastern Conference finals in 25 years.
articles.title: NBA play-offs: New York Knicks eliminate defending champions Boston Celtics

articles.description: Dean Huijsen will complete a move from Bournemouth to Real Madrid in the summer. BBC Sport looks at his rapid rise.
articles.title: Dean Huijsen to Real Madrid: How Bournemouth defender became one of Europe's most coveted.

articles.description: New Zealand tie with Canada and Australia beat USA in the second round of the Pacific Four series.
articles.title: Pacific Four Series: New Zealand and Canada tie, Australia beat USA

articles.description: Listen to Sportsound commentary from Celtic Park or Open all Mics and follow live text updates of the final Scottish Premiership top-six fixtures.
articles.title: Scottish Premiership: Build up as top six play final matches of season - LIVE - radio, text & stats - BBC Sport

articles.description: All eyes will be on Bilbao now as Manchester United and Tottenham switch focus from their disappointing domestic campaigns and try to win the Europa League.
articles.title: Europa League final - are Man Utd or Spurs in best shape?

articles.description: Chelsea keep their Champions League hopes in their heads and Aston Villa move into the top five for now following wins on Friday.
articles.title: Champions League qualification: Chelsea keep hopes in hands, Villa need slip-ups

articles.description: Jannik Sinner sets up a blockbuster Italian Open final against Carlos Alcaraz, after the world number one fought from behind to beat American Tommy Paul.
articles.title: Italian Open: Jannik Sinner and Carlos Alcaraz set up blockbuster final
